description: Twin Reflections: You're not seeing double. It's the famous Christy Twins, and we're pleased to present these twins filmed in heir home, enjoying themselves as only twin lovers can. Filmed as a visual fantasy, you will see scenes you've only read about before. Using mirrors to reflect their youthful images, they display their wares in the true tradition of the Narcissus. You'll see these two handle themselves with the ulltimate in brotherly love. The twins climax after a visual experience that makes them so hot and hard, the explosion is a well-comed relief.Technically not defined as controversial, this scene displays brothers together in a sexual situation.
title: School's Out, Scene #01
